description: Officers have been searching for former drug company boss David Noakes since December.
title: David Noakes: Unlicensed 'cancer cure' boss arrested
title_page: David Noakes: Unlicensed 'cancer cure' boss arrested - BBC News
maintext: "Following information received from a member of the public, he was arrested in the Truro area of Cornwall by officers from Devon and Cornwall Police on Wednesday 20 May 2020 and has been recalled to prison," the force said in a statement.
